Revitalize.Objects.Machines.CoalAdvanced.description: Cracks geodes open automatically. Slightly faster than a normal geode crusher. Requires coal to run.

Revitalize.Objects.Machines.ElectricAdva.description: Cracks geodes open automatically. Requires battery packs to run.

Revitalize.Objects.Machines.NuclearAdvan.description: Cracks geodes open automatically. Requires nuclear fuel cells to run.

Revitalize.Objects.Machines.MagicalAdvan.description: Cracks geodes, artifact troves, and golden coconuts open automatically. Does not require fuel to run due to it's magical reactor core.
